mapper.insert: INSERT INTO flow_opt_result( id, project_id, project_name, opt_id, result, opt_order, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{projectId}, #{projectName}, #{optId.id}, #{result}, #{optOrder}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
